entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:46 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -4.6°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: -4.6°C

Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 83 %

Dewpoint: -7.0°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls and a thunderstorm early this evening. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
